name: Feed the Beast (monster balloon)
description:
Made for "GlobalStartupCities" gamejam with the prompt: "win-win situation"

If you're having trouble try flying out of your blimp and gathering some stars yourself!

Credits and special thanks:
My brother milo for the excellent monster design
Royalty free music: https://soundtrackuniverse.com/
My partner Rachel for helping my sanity and physical well-being during this jam
